news.title: Patagonia 2026: Registration Opens
news.excerpt: Join us for the next adventure through the wild frontier of Patagonia. Registration is now open for the 2026 edition.

news.title: Europe 2025 Applications Closed
news.excerpt: Applications for the 2025 European Tour have now closed. Thank you to everyone who applied. We'll see you on the roads of the Alps!

news.title: Recap: Fireflies West 2024
news.excerpt: Relive the incredible journey from San Francisco to LA. Over 100 riders, 500+ miles, and thousands raised for City of Hope.
